function.name: ls_for_temu_com_shopping_api_realtime_api_scrapper_from_temu_com
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "temu_com_shopping_api_realtime_api_scrapper_from_temu_com", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Returns the ls_for_temu_com_shopping_api_realtime_api_scrapper_from_temu_com information based on the given goodsId (product id defined by temu, returned by the /search endpoint)
Response includes:
- price information
- product reviews
- offers/availabilit"

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer.
